Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Addison/Long
ShortDescription: Eastbound #152 buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Belmont, Laramie, and Addison, due to construction near Addison/Long.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Belmont, Laramie, and Addison, due to construction near Addison/Long.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 31st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Millard, and Central Park due to construction near 31st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Millard, and Central Park due to construction near 31st/Lawndale.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Dickens
ShortDescription: #91 buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, North, Central, Grand, and Austin due to fire department activity near Austin/Dickens.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, North, Central, Grand, and Austin, due to fire department activity near Austin/Dickens.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to track switching problems.

As a result of the delayed train, Purple Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (Loop-bound trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
